text:
e="preserve">Othón Cuevas Córdova (2 July 1965 – 28 December 2020) was a Mexican politician. He was a member of the Party of the Democratic Revolution. In 2006, he was elected to the Mexican Chamber of Deputies representing Oaxaca. He left congress in 2009. Cuevas Córdova was born in Oaxaca, Mexico.
Cuevas Córdova died on 28 December 2020 in Mexico City from COVID-19 at the age of 55
